Class PlayerControl

java.lang.Object
  gameplay.PlayerControl

public class PlayerControl
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Geoffrey Long This class takes as input the keystrokes made by the players, and makes the appropriate change on the cycle heading.

public void setHeading(int keyCode)
This method will map the keyCodes from the keystrokes to specific cycle headings. The cycle headings will be updated appropriately.
